## Libraries
```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)

library(stringr)
library(fitdistrplus)
library(logspline)
```

## Wrangling
Countries:
```{r}
countries <- read_csv("countries.csv") 
names(countries) <- gsub(" ", "", names(countries)) 

countries <- countries %>%
  rename("country" = "Country", 
         "region" = "Region",
         "population" = "Population(millions)",
         "netBiocap" = "BiocapacityDeficitorReserve") %>%
  dplyr::select(country, region, population, GDPperCapita, netBiocap) %>%
  mutate(expNetBiocap = exp(netBiocap))

hist(countries$netBiocap)

# Determine distribution of data
descdist(countries$netBiocap, discrete = FALSE)
fitBeta <- fitdist(countries$netBiocap, "beta")
plot(fitBeta)

```
